title: Call of Juarez: Bound In Blood
notes: Requires manual controller/key mapping. **Decky Plugin: Some tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Some tinkering required**.
description: In the remote and deadly Wild West, the outlaw McCall brothers are on a quest for the legendary Gold of Juarez. In their journey across a vast landscape, these lawless gunslingers will stop at nothing to achieve their goal. Arm yourself with pistols, cannons, machine guns and more as you strike out on a mission with two fearless compatriots whose bonds of blood are only strengthened by the blood they spill together.
